data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3623779,"name":"Ben","username":"slow111poke","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/848f3c/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-14T00:21:07.317Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eI’m currently in the process of setting up maple sim to be able to test stuff without having access to the bot. However, I run into the issue of not having physical controllers I can plug into my laptop to control the robot in the sim. Is there anyway around this? I have already tried vJoy, AntiMicroX, FreePIE, and UCR with Interception. From what I can tell, it expects \u003ca href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB_human_interface_device_class\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003eHID\u003c/a\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\nThanks in advance for any help.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2025-05-14T00:27:23.705Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":11,"reads":153,"readers_count":152,"score":100.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":501683,"topic_slug":"simulating-robot-without-controllers","display_username":"Ben","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB_human_interface_device_class","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"USB human interface device class - You can click and click and drag the Keyboard option from the System Joysticks window to the Joysticks window to use one. If you can’t see either of these, you can enable them from the \u003ccode\u003eDS\u003c/code\u003e tab.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eYou’ll probably need to map keys on your keyboard to specific joystick axises and buttons based off your code, which can be done through the \u003ccode\u003eDS\u003c/code\u003e tab at the top (\u003ccode\u003eDS -\u0026gt; Keyboard X
